events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store and would like to request a refund because the size is completely off and it doesn't fit me at all.
The customer's message indicates a refund request due to sizing issues, categorizing this case under Refund.
Assigning this refund request case to customer service agent team to handle the return and refund process.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your jacket. I'm here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please confirm the order number and whether the jacket has been worn or washed so we can proceed with your refund?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I have not worn the jacket and it is still in the original packaging.
Thanks for the info! You can return the jacket using the prepaid shipping label we will send you shortly, and once received, we will issue a full refund immediately.
That sounds great, thank you! I appreciate the quick response and the prepaid label makes the return process easy.
We have emailed you the prepaid shipping label. Please send the jacket back at your earliest convenience to complete the refund process.
Just checking in to confirm if you have sent the jacket back and if there is anything else we can assist you with today.
Yes, I sent the return package yesterday. I will wait for the refund confirmation.
We've received your return and processed the refund. You should see the amount credited to your account within 3-5 business days.
We would appreciate it if you could take a moment to complete a short survey about your refund experience.
The customer completed the survey, rating the refund process as very smooth and satisfactory.
Closing the refund case as resolved and customer satisfaction confirmed. Thank you!
